name: MultiSender
shortDescription: Batch send ERC-20 tokens to multiple addresses on Moonbeam, Moonriver & more
description: Multisender is a Web3 utility that streamlines the process of sending ERC-20 tokens to multiple recipients in a single transaction. Designed for speed and simplicity, it supports major EVM networks â€” including Moonbeam, Moonriver, and more. Whether you're distributing rewards, administering an airdrop, or managing treasury payouts, Multisender makes it easy: just upload a recipient list, connect your wallet (such as MetaMask), and send. No sign-up required. No data stored. It's secure, efficient, and fully compatible with tools in the Moonbeam ecosystem.
